newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha whipsawed by volatile crude, gasoline.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha whipsawed by volatile crude, gasoline.

text.p: NWE naphtha was whipsawed by volatile crude and gasoline futures on Tuesday but traders said prices were still slighly down on the day in a quiet wet market.
One trader cited a bid late Monday for pipeline spec at $226 cif NWE for end month with an offer at $230, but was not done.
Swaps moved lower with the early selloff in crude and gasoline then edged back up late to $222/$223 in November and $216/$217 in December, about $1 below Monday's levels, traders said.
NWE barge market appeared tight but most end-users were looking to November programmes for direction.
